short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bypass article paywalls with a single click using 12ft.io.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 12ft.io Proxy Helper is a simple, lightweight Chrome extension designed to enhance your online reading experience. With just a single click, the extension redirects your current page through the 12ft.io proxy, enabling seamless access to articles behind paywalls or subscription models. Enjoy an uninterrupted flow of knowledge and stay updated with the latest news, insights, and trends without any hassle. The internet is a vast ocean of information; don't let barriers hold you back from exploring it.
